graph_title: Udio mladih (uzrasta od 15-24) koji nisu zaposleni, ne obrazuju se ili obučavaju
indicator_definition: This proportion of youth (aged 15-24 years) not in education, employment or training, also known as "the NEET rate", conveys the number of young persons not in education, employment or training as a percentage of the total youth population.
indicator_name: Udio mladih (uzrasta od 15-24) koji nisu zaposleni, ne obrazuju se ili obučavaju
target_name: Do 2020. godine značajno smanjiti udio mladih koji nisu zaposleni, niti u procesu obrazovanja ili obuke

graph_titles.series: Udio mladih koji nisu u obrazovanju, zapošljavanju ili obuci, prema spolu i starosti - 13. ICLS (%)
